Line 247: Line 247:
==Athletics==
==Athletics==
  +
[[File:RosehulsportsRH.png|thumb|right|Athletics logo]]
[[Image:RHITAthletics.jpg|thumbnail|right|120px|Old logo of RHIT Football Team.]]
[[Image:RHITAthletics.jpg|thumbnail|right|120px|Old logo of RHIT Football Team.]]
There are many facilities for sports events. The Sports and Recreation Center (SRC) is home to [[basketball]] courts, [[racquetball]] courts, an indoor track, an 8-lane, {{convert|25|yd|sing=on}} swimming and diving pool, a weight-lifting room, a basketball arena (Hulbert Arena), and a multi-use room (for dance, wrestling, etc). Outside of the SRC is Cook Stadium and its [[American Football|football]] field surrounded by the William Welch Outdoor Track & Field Complex. Inside of Cook Stadium grandstand is the RHIT rifle range. Adjacent to the football field is a series of tennis courts as well as two intramural fields (used by the [[Indianapolis Colts]] during their summer training camp) near these courts. Rose-Hulman's sports facilities also include the [[Art Nehf]] [[baseball]] field, a softball field, and the Jim Rendel [[Football (soccer)|soccer]] field.
There are many facilities for sports events. The Sports and Recreation Center (SRC) is home to [[basketball]] courts, [[racquetball]] courts, an indoor track, an 8-lane, {{convert|25|yd|sing=on}} swimming and diving pool, a weight-lifting room, a basketball arena (Hulbert Arena), and a multi-use room (for dance, wrestling, etc). Outside of the SRC is Cook Stadium and its [[American Football|football]] field surrounded by the William Welch Outdoor Track & Field Complex. Inside of Cook Stadium grandstand is the RHIT rifle range. Adjacent to the football field is a series of tennis courts as well as two intramural fields (used by the [[Indianapolis Colts]] during their summer training camp) near these courts. Rose-Hulman's sports facilities also include the [[Art Nehf]] [[baseball]] field, a softball field, and the Jim Rendel [[Football (soccer)|soccer]] field.
